text: Bill Nolan (4 January 1927 – 14 August 2002) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He was originally from Northcote and returned to the club after his time at Collingwood. == Notes == == External links == * *Profile from Collingwood Forever Category:1927 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Northcote Football Club players
title: Bill Nolan (footballer, born 1927)
